participant_1.background:
I am content with being a welder and rock climber.
i once ran the mile in under 4 minutes.
i am a professional bowler.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
i often do not have the money to pay my utility bills.

participant_2.background:
I love the memories of my senior prom and how happy I was that day.
I like to catch up on my reading about business and finance on a rainy day.
i have depression and anxiety so i don t really go out a lot.
My next challenge is to skydive because I need to keep pushing my limits and I love the adrenaline.
i am a cheerleader.

content.text: Hey there, what's up?
Not much, just hanging out, watching TV. What about you?
Not much, just working on a project. I'm a welder and rock climber.
Oh wow, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to rock climb.
It's a lot of fun. You should definitely give it a try!
I will! I also have depression and anxiety. Do you have any tips for dealing with it?
Yeah, I do. I find that exercising helps a lot. I also try to spend time with friends and family who understand what I'm going through.
That's good advice. I try to do those things too.
It's not always easy, but it helps.
Yeah, I know.
What else do you like to do?
I'm a cheerleader and I love reading about business and finance.
Oh wow, that's cool! I'm not very good at math, but I do enjoy reading about business.
Me too! I love learning about how businesses work.
That's awesome.
Thanks!
What are you looking forward to in the future?
I'm looking forward to skydiving! I've always wanted to do it and I think it will be a lot of fun.
That sounds like a great challenge! I hope you have a lot of fun.
Thanks!
Me too!
